message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $95. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot more than that. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $85 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $90. This still leaves a good deal for you, and it's closer to the actual value of the product. Let me know what you think!
